name: BricksAndStonesMayBreakMyBonzButCancerWillNeverTiltMe
author: agito
notes: did 3sdninja to get out of plat and wanted to play a deck that isnt getting nerfed soon to go leg1 to kog so i chose this and  it worked out really well and it was very poetic  that my last game was against a rez deck who bricked
